rows.label: tev011501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Jim about the duties of a Mediator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Jim if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Jim for his thoughts on public order in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Jim about the enemy assault.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Jim if he has any interesting news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Jim what he's going to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Jim about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Jim about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0001
rows.name:
While the rest of the BLADEs are doing battle outside
the city, we Mediators are responsible for resolving
conflicts within New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0002
rows.name:
To do so, we patrol the city streets looking for signs
of trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0003
rows.name:
There's no telling when enemies might slip past the
Interceptors and make their way into the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0004
rows.name:
We're all keeping a focused watch for anything that
seems out of the ordinary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0005
rows.name:
After all, this is a foreign world where anything could
happen. For all we know, there could be an invisible
xenoform standing behind you right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Most new BLADE recruits are placed in divisions
focused on outside exploration, leaving the Mediators
division chronically understaffed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Admittedly, our duties involve less danger than
battling it out with angry indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0010
rows.name:
But indigens don't voice petty grievances or become
violent over ideology, now do they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'm just saying that beyond suppressing threats,
we must also listen to our citizens and strive to
understand where they're coming from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Doing our job the right way takes time and manpower.
Honestly, we could use a few more people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thanks to everyone's hard work, most of the city's
functionality has been restored, and our lives have
become a little more normal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0021
rows.name:
However, that's also allowed the criminal element to
emerge from hiding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Suspicious activities have begun to occur throughout
New LA, and even we Mediators don't have all the
details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0023
rows.name:
No one's going to post about such criminal activities
on Mission Control, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0024
rows.name:
We have to learn about and resolve them by speaking
to the people of New LA directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you're a righteous BLADE with a will to help the
people of this city, you should lend an ear to any
citizen who seems troubled.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0040
rows.name:
We Mediators were attacked as we led the evacuation
of the civilians, and had to fight in their defense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0041
rows.name:
Sadly, many of my friends died holding back the
Ganglion attackers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0042
rows.name:
So that's the power level of the enemy we're facingâ€”
we can barely protect the things we value most.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0043
rows.name: The way things are now, we don't stand a chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0044
rows.name:
BLADE needs to strengthen itself, and I'm wondering if
perhaps our new xenoform friends can help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0047
rows.name:
Recently, a Ma-non named Ackwar joined the
Mediators.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0048
rows.name:
As more xenoforms move into New LA, we encounter
more and more situations where our human intuition
is simply not up to the task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0049
rows.name:
Ackwar was recruited into the Mediators to help us
with these sorts of situations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0050
rows.name:
His behavior can be impetuous for a Ma-non, and he's
a little reckless, but he has a strong sense of justice.
I quite like him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0051
rows.name:
We've never had a xenoform colleague before,
but I think we're all going to get along just fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0056
rows.name:
At a glance, New LA seems to be at peace ever since
your team defeated the Ganglion boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0057
rows.name:
But as the city transforms into a melting pot of various
xenoform races, maintaining public order has become
a much greater challenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0058
rows.name:
As far as the Mediators are concerned,
our war has only just begun![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG0059
rows.name:
But it's a war I'm confident we can win. You fought
hard to bring us peace, and we will do what we must
to maintain it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG1001
rows.name:
Ackwar is fond of saying "We Ma-non owe our
lives to humanity, and I intend to pay that debt."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG1002
rows.name:
After all the benefit we've reaped from Ma-non tech,
I don't know if that even holds true anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG1003
rows.name:
But he's a stubborn guy, and really serious about
seeing justice done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG1004
rows.name:
His enthusiasm even inspired me to devote myself
more forcefully to my duties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG1005
rows.name:
Like him, I won't let anything stand in the way of doing
what I believe to be right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG2001
rows.name:
I still can't believe that Powell from Army Pizza was
the Ma-non serial killer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG2002
rows.name:
Ackwar did great work on that case. Now all the
Ma-non living in New LA will be able to rest easier.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG2003
rows.name:
Still, we have to make sure nothing like that ever
happens again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG2004
rows.name:
We must make New LA a safe city for everyone,
no matter what planet they come from. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011501_MSG2005
rows.name:
And like Ackwar, I'm going to do whatever it takes to
back that promise up![ST:wait ]
